summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Rainier Avenue, from 57th Avenue South to Ryan Street (or city limits) by grading the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2693 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
